revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ilex Forest |image = [[File:Ilex Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ilex Forest. |tokens = 4,000 |location = On route 34. }} '''Ilex Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 82,200 |- | Noctowl (Boss) || 300,000 |- | Beedrill (Boss) || 300,000 |- | Butterfree (Boss) || 300,000 |- | Celebi (Boss) || 600,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Caterpie * Metapod * Weedle * Kakuna * Zubat * Oddish * Paras * Hoothoot * Noctowl (boss) * Beedrill (boss) * Butterfree (boss) * Celebi (boss) *Requires being Johto Champion
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} [[Token Collector]] || 25% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
